episodes.title: SCENTSY FAMILY REUNION 2024 SOUNDS LIKE A CULT MEETING #antimlm
episodes.description:
It's that time of year again for the annual Scentsy Family Reunion! This means that we have a TON of MLM convention content to react to. 

If you're not familiar, Scentsy is an MLM (Multi level marketing) / network marketing company that focuses on scented products and, of course, recruiting into the alleged pyramid scheme.

In this video we are reacting to a few pieces of content regarding Scentsy Family Reunion 2024, including a sponsorship training that took place that supports the argument that Scentsy might actually be a pyramid scheme...or at the very least, a cult.

Let's react...

CHAPTERS
00:00 Intro
02:10 Reaction to sponsorship training
15:39 Reaction to team call SFR recap
01:32:20 TikTok Hates Your Bullsh*t

Scentsy deep dive video :
https://youtu.be/Hl7hcq4NxQI?si=hN7iOPzKLHImcEJI
